Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled performance, we believe its true value exceeds $10000. For this remarkable opportunity, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $15000. This is a limited-time offer designed to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for superior products. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier solution. If you have any questions or require further information, please feel free to reach out. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
